articles.title: 2022 Skoda Kodiaq Facelift Launched In India; Prices Start At Rs. 34.99 Lakh - carandbike
articles.description: The 2022 Skoda Kodiaq facelift SUV comes in three trims with prices starting at Rs. 34.99 lakh (ex-showroom). The SUV gets subtle design updates, new features and a BS6-compliant 2.0-litre TSI petrol engine.
